snippet: Walid al-Moallem called on the United Nations to push for lifting the measure as government forces continued air and artillery strikes in the Damascus suburbs.
abstract: Syrian Foreign Min Walid al-Moallem blames international sanctions for his country's problems and calls on United Nations to help lift measures, which were imposed to punish government for its crackdown on pro-democracy protesters that spiraled into civil war.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and C. J. CHIVERS
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and C. J. Chivers from Antakya, Turkey. Hania Mourtada contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Walid al-Moallem called on the United Nations to push for lifting the measure as government forces continued air and artillery strikes in the Damascus suburbs.

headline.main: Foreign Minister Blames Sanctions for Syria’s Troubles
headline.print_headline: Foreign Minister Blames Sanctions for Syria’s Troubles
